name: Dino Runner Genesis
description:
A Sega Genesis/Mega Drive clone of the famous Chrome Game. The obstacles are randomly generated. Since it was already difficult this way I didn't include the pterodactyls. This is my first game on the Genesis and the second in general. It was a really fun project even when sometime was really hard to get some things done.

Controls

UP or A to jump
Start - Pause the game (This restart the game)
